CustomField.formula: "&solmgr=1" + "&id=" + Id + "&queryid=[SIPT1]0Q_1172AK074839,[SIIG]0Q_1182AK074839,[SILIG]0Q_1192AK074840,[SID]0Q_1202AK074840,[SIVTC]0Q_1212AK074840,[SIDST]0Q_1222AK074840,[SIPT4]0Q_1232AK074840,[SIILI]0Q_1242AK074840,[SIDST3]0Q_1252AK074840,[SICF]0Q_1262AK074840,[SIPT5]0Q_1272AK074840,[SIPT3]0Q_1282AK074840,[SIA]0Q_1292AK074840,[SIDST4]0Q_1302AK074840,[SILI]0Q_1312AK074840,[SIPT2]0Q_1322AK074841,[SIDST2]0Q_1332AK074841,[SIDSV]0Q_1342AK074841,[SIDTL]0Q_1352AK074841,[SILIC]0Q_1362AK074841,[SICTC1]0Q_1372AK074841,[SICTC2]0Q_1382AK074841,[SIWTDTL]0Q_1392AK074841,[SIQR]0Q_1402AK074841" + "&emailadditionalto=" + ffaci__InvoiceEmail__c + "&dv0=" + IF ( ISPICKVAL(c2g__InvoiceStatus__c, "Complete"), "", "Draft") + "&ofn=" + Name + "&templateid=" + ffaci__CongaTemplate__c + "&EmailCC={QVar0}" + "&QVar0Format=10000" + "&congaemailtemplateid={QVar1}" + "&emailsubject=" + c2g__OwnerCompany__r.Name + " Invoice: " + Name + "&qmode=SendEmail" + "&defaultpdf=1" + "&MFTS0=cer_Email_Sent__c" + "&MFTSValue0=TRUE" + "&MFTS1=cer_Email_Sent_Date__c" + "&MFTSValue1=TODAY" + "&currencyculture=" + ffaci__CurrencyCulture__c + "&uf0=1" + "&dv1=" + ffaci__CurrencyCulture__c + "&qvar0id=aF2KO000000Gmdy?pv0=" + c2g__Account__r.Id + "&qvar1id=aF2KO000000GmcV" + "&SC0=1" + "&SC1=SalesforceFile"
